mapper.select: select oc.id, oc.topic_id, oc.topic_type, oc.from_id, oc.from_avatar, oc.from_name, oc.from_type, oc.to_id, oc.to_name, oc.content, oc.images, oc.reply_id, oc.delete_status, oc.root, oc.create_at, oc.comment_count, oc.praise_count, oc.anonymous_status, if(uup.id is null, false, true) praised, if(ost.id is null, false,true) rewarded from om_comment oc left join um_user_praise uup on uup.target_type = 1 and uup.target_id = oc.id and uup.user_id = #{currentUserId} left join om_shop_transaction ost on ost.target_id = oc.id where topic_id = #{rewardId} and topic_type = 2
